name: Solitaire 3D: Card Games
description:
Solitaire: is a Free classic solitaire card games. It also called Klondike. It’s the most popular way that people to play solitaire in the world. 🌊🌊

If you like playing card games, then solitaire must be a game you can't lack.🃏

You can experience in our products: the mystery of the ocean🌊and the beauty of fish🐠. It's like having the feeling of being in the aquarium all the time!

How to play our game🚢:
-The goal is to move all cards to the foundation. Stacking them by suit from Aces to King. For example, A, 2, 3, and so on.🏊
-Cards can be moved from column to column. In each column, the cards are arranged in order from largest to smallest. Alternating red and black.🏊
-The sorting order on each pedestal in the upper left corner is arranged according to: "A-2-3-...-Q-K🏊
